summary: Discussion on the possibility of adding a feature to allow users to customize the color scheme of the app, with some suggestions for color palettes and a request for a dark mode.
Discussion on the possibility of adding a feature to allow users to customize the color scheme of the app, with some suggestions for color palettes and a request for a dark mode.

issue_title: fix(core - patch)：when before patch: old keys like [a, b, c ...] new …
summary: Issue regarding repeated keys in a Vue.js component list, specifically in the 'Wrapper.vue' file. The 'changeList' method is causing an error due to repeated keys, which is not supposed to be 'fixed' as it is intended behavior.

Type mismatch error in CombinedModal.vue, possibly related to vue2 type issue and volar's conversion of v-on:xxx to onXxx. Suggested fix is to ensure props passed to HelloWorld component match the expected props.

issue_title: style: remove WTF, also keep it classy [skip ci]
summary: Users are experiencing issues with the installation process of the latest version of the package on Windows systems. The suggested workaround is to manually install the required dependencies before installing the package. A fix for this issue is being discussed.
